channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2023110804
item.description:
Report X-2023110804

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-01T18:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-06
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package noticed to be stained during unload. Package had been loaded on its side and crushed by weight of package above. 5 gallon pail dented and liqwuid was pushed out DescribePack: dented. liquid pushed out. no holes or cracks DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: placed in salvage drum

item.title: Report X-2023111053
item.description:
Report X-2023111053

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-30T18:13:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-10
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE AS LEAKED ON BY AN UNKNOWN SUBSTANCE WHILE IN SHIPPING CONTAINER. WHILE REPACKING THE ITEMS IN THE BOX IS WAS DISCOVERED THAT THERE WAS AN UNDECLARED AEROSOLS ALONG WITH A FIRE EXTINGUISHER INCLUDED IN THE ITEMS. PROCESSING AS UNDECLARED.

item.title: Report E-2023110319
item.description:
Report E-2023110319

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-30T18:13:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-14
  • City: EUGENE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A plastic box on a pallet containing (14-15) 50lb plastic jerricans fell over in the offloading process resulting in (2) plastic jerricans cracking and releasing 1-gallon of UN2783 into a 1'x1' puddle on the dock. The jerricans cracked against the plastic pallet that was under the plastic box. A contractor clean-up the release and re-palletized the intact product. No storm drains, waterways or soil were impacted by the release.

item.title: Report X-2023110385
item.description:
Report X-2023110385

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-30T18:13:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-13
  • City: SPRINGFIELD
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY 8 POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING POSSIBLE AGRICULTURE SAMPLES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM OREGON USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 1Y197A, PRTUSA, 31783 S MERIDIAN RD., HUBBARD OR 97032.

item.title: Report E-2023110213
item.description:
Report E-2023110213

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-28T18:13:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-18
  • City: CLACKAMAS
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that due to a forklift puncture, 3 32 Oz cans of Naked Gun Spray Gun Cleaner Aerosol (UN1950) were punctured and released onto cardboard packaging and other cases of the material, The terminal advised that due to the impact, the terminal will be holding back 3 cases 18 cans in total. (1) 55Gal DF - containing the product and packaging PPE and absorbents was created as waste and left for the terminal to manage onsite.

Report X-2023110262

  • Description: RESPONDER FOUND A LEAKING PACKAGE WITH NO OUTER MARKINGS IN THE UNLOAD. UPON OPENING THE PACKAGE, THE RESPONDER SAW THAT THE INNER PRODUCT HAD A HAZ-MAT DIAMOND, ORGANIC PEROXIDE 5.2 AND CONTACTED HELP DESK.

item.title: Report X-2023110028
item.description:
Report X-2023110028

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-15
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was presented to Quality Assurance during the unload process as it was visually apparent there had been some leakage. Upon inspecting it was determined there was no inner packing used causing the contents to shift leading the caps to fail. DescribePack: The gallon bottles shifted in transit loosening their caps causing leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in black bin with hazmat liner

item.title: Report X-2023101493
item.description:
Report X-2023101493

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-21
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: EMPLOYEE FOUND LEAKING PACKAGE IN THE PSC. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION WHEN OPENING THE PACKAGE, AEROSOL CANS WERE DISCOVERED INSIDE OF THE PACKAGE. THE OUTSIDE OF THE PACKAGE DID NOT HAVE A LIMITED QUANTITY HAZMAT LABEL OR REGULATED HAZMAT LABEL/SHIPPING PAPERS (I.E. FLAMMABLE GAS), SO THE PACKAGE WAS SUSPECTED TO BE AN UNDELCLARED HAZMAT. HMSC WAS CALLED TO CONFIRM, AND INSTRUCTIONS WERE GIVEN TO PUT A HOLD ON THE PACKAGE.

item.title: Report X-2023101492

Report X-2023101492

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PAKAGE WAS LEAKED ON. FURTHER INSPECTION BY RESPONDER REVEALED SUSPECTED UNDECLARED (LIGHTERS). NOTIFIED RMP, RMP REPORTED TO HMSC. PACKAGE HELD FOR ADG RELEASE.

item.title: Report X-2023101480
item.description:
Report X-2023101480

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-24
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO CALL FOR WET HAZMAT PACKAGE. STRONG ACIDIC ODOR WAS DETECTED. PH TEST CONFIRMED THAT WET AFFECTED AREA WAS DUE TO INNER CONTENTS LEAKING. INNER CONTENTS WERE SECURED BY "FOAM IN BAG" PACKING MATERIAL AND WRAPPED IN A THICK PLASTIC
